channel.title: The Daily Decrypt Podcast
channel.description: We are here to serve up the latest Cryptocurrency & P2P tech news, to keep you up to date with the latest trends and developments so you don't spend all day researching! Some hot coffee & The Daily Decrypt make a great way to get your daily crypto morning!

item.title: NEWS: Ingenico integration; Shapeshifting skeleton; and Desktop robot
item.description:
Ingenico POS terminals get upgraded; What you might not know about Ukraine; a Skeleton comes out of ShapeShift's closet; Jeffrey Tucker publishes; Makerarm wants to make your life easier; Headphones for the health-conscious.
Connect with us! [website] http://TheDailyDecrypt.com [tweets] http://Twitter.com/TheDailyDecrypt [facebook] http://Facebook.com/TheDailyDecrypt [podcast] http://Soundcloud.com/The-LTB-Network [LTB Network] https://LetsTalkBitcoin.com/Blog/The-Daily-Decrypt
Wanna sponsor a show? http://TheDailyDecrypt.com/Sponsorship
Show links: Ingenico Terminals: http://www.coindesk.com/point-of-sale-giant-ingenico-rolls-out-worldwide-bitcoin-payments/ & http://www.ingenico.com/our-solutions/smart-terminals Bitcoin ATMs: http://cointelegraph.com/news/115375/bitcoins-new-atm-capital-of-the-world-moves-near-military-hot-zone Shapeshift Skeleton: https://shapeshift.io/site/tools/skeleton Bit by Bit: https://liberty.me/library/bit-by-bit/ & https://youtu.be/2h9CsGs9eY8 Makerarm: http://techcrunch.com/2015/10/06/makerarm-is-an-all-in-one-robotic-laser-cutter-3d-printer-painter-fabricator-and-assembler/ & https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/1849283018/makerarm-the-first-robotic-arm-that-makes-anything Biometric Headphones: http://vytm.in/fvBZZQ#http://www.wareable.com/headphones/best-sports-headphones

item.title: NEWS: Transaction prices. Dogecoin on Ethereum. Tritium & Bitcoin Jesus.
item.description:
What happens to Bitcoin transaction prices when demand exceeds supply? BitFirm's shares on NXT. ForkLog covers Doge on E. Purse's Tritium geared to 'Joe Average.' Roger Ver on Power & Market.
